org.arl.fjage.rmi

Class Gateway

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.arl.fjage.rmi.Gateway

  • public class Gateway
extends java.lang.Object
    Gateway to communicate with agents from Java classes. Only agents in a master or slave container can be accessed using this gateway.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long BLOCKING
      Represents a blocking timeout of infinite time.
      static long NON_BLOCKING
      Represents a non-blocking timeout of 0 seconds.

      Creates a gateway connecting to a specified master container.

    • Field Detail

      • NON_BLOCKING

        public static final long NON_BLOCKING
        Represents a non-blocking timeout of 0 seconds. Can be used with all Agent methods that take a timeout parameter.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BLOCKING

        public static final long BLOCKING
        Represents a blocking timeout of infinite time. Can be used with all Agent methods that take a timeout parameter.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Gateway

        public Gateway(Platform platform,
       java.lang.String url)
        throws java.io.IOException,
               java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Creates a gateway connecting to a specified master container. The platform specified is this call should not be started previously, and will be automatically started by the gateway.
        Parameters:
        platform - platform to use
        url - URL of master platform to connect to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.rmi.NotBoundException

      • Gateway

        public Gateway(java.lang.String url)
        throws java.io.IOException,
               java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Creates a gateway connecting to a specified master container.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of master platform to connect to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.rmi.NotBoundException

    • Method Detail

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Closes the gateway. The gateway functionality may not longer be accessed after this method is called.

      • send

        public void send(Message m)
        Sends a message to the recipient indicated in the message. The recipient may be an agent or a topic.
        Parameters:
        m - message to be sent.

      • receive

        public Message receive(MessageFilter filter,
              long timeout)
        Returns a message received by the gateway and matching the given filter. This method blocks until timeout if no message available.
        Parameters:
        filter - message filter.
        timeout - timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        received message matching the filter, null on timeout.

      • receive

        public final Message receive()
        Returns a message received by the gateway. This method is non-blocking.
        Returns:
        received message, null if none available.

      • receive

        public Message receive(long timeout)
        Returns a message received by the agent. This method blocks until timeout if no message available.
        Parameters:
        timeout - timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        received message, null on timeout.

      • receive

        public Message receive(java.lang.Class<?> cls)
        Returns a message of a given class received by the gateway. This method is non-blocking.
        Parameters:
        cls - the class of the message of interest.
        Returns:
        received message of the given class, null if none available.

      • receive

        public Message receive(java.lang.Class<?> cls,
              long timeout)
        Returns a message of a given class received by the gateway. This method blocks until timeout if no message available.
        Parameters:
        cls - the class of the message of interest.
        timeout - timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        received message of the given class, null on timeout.

      • receive

        public Message receive(Message m)
        Returns a response message received by the gateway. This method is non-blocking.
        Parameters:
        m - original message to which a response is expected.
        Returns:
        received response message, null if none available.

      • receive

        public Message receive(Message m,
              long timeout)
        Returns a response message received by the gateway. This method blocks until timeout if no message available.
        Parameters:
        m - original message to which a response is expected.
        timeout - timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        received response message, null on timeout.

      • request

        public Message request(Message msg,
              long timeout)
        Sends a request and waits for a response. This method blocks until timeout if no response is received.
        Parameters:
        msg - message to send.
        timeout - timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        received response message, null on timeout.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        object representing the topic.

      • subscribe

        public boolean subscribe(AgentID topic)
        Subscribes the gateway to receive all messages sent to the given topic.
        Parameters:
        topic - the topic to subscribe to.
        Returns:
        true if the subscription is successful, false otherwise.

      • unsubscribe

        public boolean unsubscribe(AgentID topic)
        Unsubscribes the gateway from a given topic.
        Parameters:
        topic - the topic to unsubscribe.
        Returns:
        true if the unsubscription is successful, false otherwise.

      • agentForService

        public AgentID agentForService(java.lang.String service)
        Finds an agent that provides a named service. If multiple agents are registered to provide a given service, any of the agents' id may be returned.
        Parameters:
        service - the named service of interest.
        Returns:
        an agent id for an agent that provides the service.

      • agentForService

        public AgentID agentForService(java.lang.Enum<?> service)
        Finds an agent that provides a named service. If multiple agents are registered to provide a given service, any of the agents' id may be returned.
        Parameters:
        service - the named service of interest.
        Returns:
        an agent id for an agent that provides the service.

      • agentsForService

        public AgentID[] agentsForService(java.lang.String service)
        Finds all agents that provides a named service.
        Parameters:
        service - the named service of interest.
        Returns:
        an array of agent ids representing all agent that provide the service.

      • agentsForService

        public AgentID[] agentsForService(java.lang.Enum<?> service)
        Finds all agents that provides a named service.
        Parameters:
        service - the named service of interest.
        Returns:
        an array of agent ids representing all agent that provide the service.
